mng: woven mat, seat, banquet, place in a democratic assembly, classifier for banquets, conversations etc

exm.mng: woven mat, seat, banquet, place in a democratic assembly, classifier for banquets, conversations etc
(acknowledged) place, a role to play, niche
to attend a meeting as a nonvoting delegate
seat (at banquet), by ext. guest of honor
summer sleeping mat (e.g. of woven split bamboo)
to engulf, to sweep, to carry away everything
a seat (in a theater, stadium etc), parliamentary or congressional seat
lit. a banquet with no empty seats, full house, capacity crowd, standing room only
the content of a conversation, words, remarks
